text: Mem Saheb is a 1972 Bengali film directed by Pinaki Mukherjee. Pinaki Mukherjee also acting this film. This film produced by Ashim Bhattacharya. This film production company by Angel Digital Private Limited. The film has been music composed by Asim Bhattacharya. This film won the Filmfare Awards East in 1972. It stars Uttam Kumar, Gita Dey, Sumitra Mukherjee, Bikash Roy, Aparna Sen and Jahor Roy in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Uttam Kumar * Gita Dey * Sumitra Mukherjee * Bikash Roy * Aparna Sen * Jahor Roy * Lolita Chatterjee * Dilip Mukherjee * Pinaki Mukherjee * Gour Shee ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" |- ! Ceremony ! Award ! Category ! Nominee !
